11#include "modules/audio_coding/audio_network_adaptor/bitrate_controller.h"
12
13#include <algorithm>
14
15#include "rtc_base/checks.h"
16#include "system_wrappers/include/field_trial.h"
17
18namespace webrtc {
19namespace audio_network_adaptor {
20
21BitrateController::Config::Config(int initial_bitrate_bps,
22 int initial_frame_length_ms,
23 int fl_increase_overhead_offset,
24 int fl_decrease_overhead_offset)
25 : initial_bitrate_bps(initial_bitrate_bps),
26 initial_frame_length_ms(initial_frame_length_ms),
27 fl_increase_overhead_offset(fl_increase_overhead_offset),
28 fl_decrease_overhead_offset(fl_decrease_overhead_offset) {}
29
30BitrateController::Config::~Config() = default;
31
32BitrateController::BitrateController(const Config& config)
33 : config_(config),
34 bitrate_bps_(config_.initial_bitrate_bps),
35 frame_length_ms_(config_.initial_frame_length_ms) {
36 RTC_DCHECK_GT(bitrate_bps_, 0);
37 RTC_DCHECK_GT(frame_length_ms_, 0);
38}
39
40BitrateController::~BitrateController() = default;
41
42void BitrateController::UpdateNetworkMetrics(
43 const NetworkMetrics& network_metrics) {
44 if (network_metrics.target_audio_bitrate_bps)
45 target_audio_bitrate_bps_ = network_metrics.target_audio_bitrate_bps;
46 if (network_metrics.overhead_bytes_per_packet) {
47 RTC_DCHECK_GT(*network_metrics.overhead_bytes_per_packet, 0);
48 overhead_bytes_per_packet_ = network_metrics.overhead_bytes_per_packet;
49 }
50}
51
52void BitrateController::MakeDecision(AudioEncoderRuntimeConfig* config) {
53 // Decision on |bitrate_bps| should not have been made.
54 RTC_DCHECK(!config->bitrate_bps);
55 if (target_audio_bitrate_bps_ && overhead_bytes_per_packet_) {
56 if (config->frame_length_ms)
57 frame_length_ms_ = *config->frame_length_ms;
58 int offset = config->last_fl_change_increase
59 ? config_.fl_increase_overhead_offset
60 : config_.fl_decrease_overhead_offset;
61 // Check that
62 // -(*overhead_bytes_per_packet_) <= offset <= (*overhead_bytes_per_packet_)
63 RTC_DCHECK_GE(*overhead_bytes_per_packet_, -offset);
64 RTC_DCHECK_LE(offset, *overhead_bytes_per_packet_);
65 int overhead_rate_bps = static_cast<int>(
66 (*overhead_bytes_per_packet_ + offset) * 8 * 1000 / frame_length_ms_);
67 bitrate_bps_ = std::max(0, *target_audio_bitrate_bps_ - overhead_rate_bps);
68 }
69 config->bitrate_bps = bitrate_bps_;
70}
71
72} // namespace audio_network_adaptor
73} // namespace webrtc
74
